svg.content: <mxfile host="www.draw.io" modified="2020-09-28T08:57:50.699Z" agent="5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/85.0.4183.121 Safari/537.36" etag="nnFe3clNiyErc5ZI1uXd" version="13.7.5" type="google"><diagram id="cP5tZeq73klAyiit9Y2a" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 247px; height: 1px; padding-top: 564px; margin-left: 72px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 380px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Staking Contract
It holds and keeps track of user staking tokens (i.e. DAI, USDC, sUSD, uniswapv2 pair token for BOND/USDC, potentially even BOND itself for mintr). Epochs are 1 week periods based on block.timestamp, beginning with Monday 00:00:00 UTC.
deposit(tokenAddress, amount)
withdraw(tokenAddress, amount)
getEpochUserBalance(user, token, epochId)
balanceOf(user, token)
getCurrentEpoch()
getEpochPoolSize(tokenAddress, epochId)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 224px; margin-left: 657px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 510px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: It has distribution mechanism for which interested parties pay with opportunity cost and Barnbridge receives no funds. The rationale is to achieve a "fair" chance to receive BOND tokens for anyone.

ul.li: Number of distributed tokens is equal for all epochs; each epoch emits = 800.000 / number of epochs = 33,333.33 tokens
DAI, USDC, and sUSD can be staked

div.div: After the end of an epoch, a user can call harvest(epochId) and they will receive a pro rata amount of BOND as reward, if they had a valid token staked for the entire epoch duration. massHarvest() can be used for multiple epoch BOND claims.

div.span: The information about the amount staked and the duration is provided by the staking contract.

div.div: The BOND tokens are held in the Community BOND vault, and the Yeild Farming Contract is given allowance for 800k BOND tokens. It will transfer rewards to the user using transferFrom function of BOND.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 794px; margin-left: 657px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 520px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: The purpose of this contract is to give a long term incentive to Uniswap Liquidy Prodivers for BOND/USDC pair. This will add a demand mechanism for the BOND. On top of that, it will distribute some part of the Community Token allocation to parties interested in BarnBridge, while also adding liquidity to the token which is crucial for the success of the project.

div.style: font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

ul.li: Number of distributed tokens is equal for all epochs; each epoch emits = 2,000,000 / number of epochs 100 = 20,000 tokens
This mechanism will begin on epoch 2 of Yield Farming

div.div: The harvest function will work similar to the yield farming. The only acceptable token is USDC_BOND_UNI_LP token.
The BOND tokens are held in the Community BOND vault, and the YieldFarmLP Contract is given allowance for 2mm BOND tokens. It will transfer rewards to the user using transferFrom function of BOND.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 567px; margin-left: 1167px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 398px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: The purpose of this vault is to hold 65% of the BOND tokens to be allocated to the community.

div.style: font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

ul.li: 8% will be allocated to the Yield Farming Contract
20% to the LP Incentivization contract which will activate after the Yield Farming is concluded
17% for incentivizing variable rate tranches in Smart Yield product
20% for incentivizing junior tranches in Smart Alpha product

div.style: font-size: 12px ; font-weight: 400
font-size: 12px ; font-weight: 400

div.div: The LaunchDAO will govern over this contract. After the main DAO is launched, the control will be handed over to main DAO.

div.style: font-size: 12px ; font-weight: 400
font-size: 12px ; font-weight: 400
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1224px; margin-left: 1167px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 425px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: Until the main DAO is launched, the initial stakeholders will govern over important functions: BOND treasury management, Community Tokens Vault and their allocation to different contracts (Yield Farming, LP Incentivization).

div.style: font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: The stakeholder tokens allocation will be done through vesting contracts deployed for each entity, and the LaunchDAO will vote to send their share of the BONDS to those vesting contracts (2 years linear vesting, weekly synced with YieldFarm epochs).

div.style: font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: The community portion will be voted to be send to the Community Tokens Vault, which the LaunchDAO is an admin of. From there, allocations to different rewarding contracts will be made.

div.style: font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: After the launch of the mainDAO, all the treasury and admin functions will be handed over to the main DAO.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1214px; margin-left: 1577px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 190px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: This contract handles the vesting logic for a BarnBridge stakeholder. Each stakeholder can have one or more of these vesting contracts deployed. The LaunchDAO needs to vote to send their share to these contracts.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1424px; margin-left: 1577px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 190px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: This contract handles the vesting logic for a BarnBridge stakeholder. Each stakeholder can have one or more of these vesting contracts deployed. The LaunchDAO needs to vote to send their share to these contracts.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1634px; margin-left: 1577px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 190px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: This contract handles the vesting logic for a BarnBridge stakeholder. Each stakeholder can have one or more of these vesting contracts deployed. The LaunchDAO needs to vote to send their share to these contracts.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 252px; height: 1px; padding-top: 144px; margin-left: 1167px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 220px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: Optional/TBD for future Community Token distribution.

div.style: font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px
font-weight: 400 ; font-size: 12px

h1.div: We have the option to add incentive contracts that use a staking mechanism anytime in the future. This is such an example. After the Yield Farming and LP incentivizations are complete, the main DAO could decide to deploy a mintr contract to reward a portion of the Community Tokens to BOND stakers.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
